QuestData.Title: Get to the Gyrochoppa!
QuestData.Description: The Alliance have stolen something of vital importance to the Horde. It is being held out on their ships.$B$BAt the other end of the beach is a gyrochoppa. Our battlesworn will cover your approach.$B$BGo retrieve the keys to the flying machine from one of their operatives.$B$BFly out to their flagship, the Vengeance Wake, and retrieve our precious cargo!
QuestData.CompletionText: Hmm, looks like overly-complicated gnomish engineering with lots of unnecessary instrumentation and safety precautions.
QuestData.RewardText: Hmm, where the heck is the ignition?$B$BIt'll be a wonder if it flies without doing something weird, like turning into a chicken or shrinking down to the size of an ant.$B$BHey look, someone left their loose change in the ashtray! What else is in there?
